original_text: When John had almost finished his work, he said to the people, “Perhaps you think that I am the special man that God will send. I am not that man. But listen! That man will come soon. I am not good enough even to undo his shoes for him.” ’
korean_text: 요한이 그 달려갈 길을 마칠 때에 말하되 너희가 나를 누구로 생각하느냐 나는 그리스도가 아니라 내 뒤에 오시는 이가 있으니 나는 그 발의 신발끈을 풀기도 감당하지 못하리라 하였으니

sentences.original_text: When John had almost finished his work
sentences.korean_translation: 요한이 그의 일을 거의 마쳤을 때

sentences.original_text: Perhaps you think that I am the special man
sentences.korean_translation: 아마도 당신은 내가 그 특별한 사람이라고 생각할 것이다

sentences.original_text: even to undo his shoes for him
